text: Alejandro Ramón Maciel (born 22 April 1997) is an Argentine professional footballer who plays as a centre back for Talleres. ==Career== Maciel began with Sportivo Eldorado, before joining Boca Juniors. In August 2016, Maciel joined Talleres' academy on loan. The deal was made permanent in January 2018, with Maciel joining as part of the transfer that took Emanuel Reynoso to Boca Juniors. He was promoted into Talleres' senior squad from December 2017, being an unused substitute for fixtures with Colón, Defensa y Justicia and Gimnasia y Esgrima in the 2017–18 Primera División campaign. On 22 June 2018, Maciel was loaned to Primera B Nacional's Santamarina. After an ankle injury, his pro bow came in March 2019 versus Almagro.
